title: Glider 14 Day trial
description:
Glider:
Glider is a tool that plays your World of Warcraft character for you, the way you want it. It grinds, it loots, it skins, it heals, it even farms soul shards... without you.
This Glider version is a special on. Its the official 14Days Trial Version.

Version: 1.6.2

Before using Glider, you must have the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0. To tell if you have it already, open Control Panel and select "Add/Remove Programs" and look for it in the list.

If you don&#039;t have it or you&#039;re not sure if you have it, download and run it with the link below.
 <a href="
http://www.mmoglider.com/dotnetfx20.exe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.mmoglider.com/dotnetfx20.exe</a>

1. Create a new folder on your computer where you wish to store Glider, either on your desktop or just anywhere on your hard disk.

2. Save the : "GliderDeploy 14 Days Trial Version.exe" to this folder

3. Run the downloaded GliderDeploy.exe

4. now you are ble to glide 14 Days for free
